Package org.radarbase.management.web.rest

Class SourceResource

java.lang.Object
org.radarbase.management.web.rest.SourceResource
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api") public class SourceResource extends Object
REST controller for managing Source.

  • Method Details

    • createSource

      @PostMapping("/sources") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SourceDTO> createSource(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid SourceDTO sourceDto) throws URISyntaxException, org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
      POST /sources : Create a new source.
      Parameters:
      sourceDto - the sourceDto to create
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 201 (Created) and with body the new sourceDto, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the source has already an ID
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect
      org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

    • updateSource

      @PutMapping("/sources") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SourceDTO> updateSource(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid SourceDTO sourceDto) throws URISyntaxException, org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
      PUT /sources : Updates an existing source.
      Parameters:
      sourceDto - the sourceDto to update
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the updated sourceDto, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the sourceDto is not valid, or with status 500 (Internal Server Error) if the sourceDto couldnt be updated
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect
      org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

    • getAllSources

      @GetMapping("/sources") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<SourceDTO>> getAllSources(@PageableDefault(page=0,size=2147483647) org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable) throws org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
      GET /sources : get all the sources.
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the list of sources in body
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

    • getSource

      @GetMapping("/sources/{sourceName:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SourceDTO> getSource(@PathVariable String sourceName) throws org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
      GET /sources/:sourceName : get the source with this sourceName.
      Parameters:
      sourceName - the name of the sourceDTO to retrieve
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the sourceDTO, or with status 404 (Not Found)
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

    • deleteSource

      @DeleteMapping("/sources/{sourceName:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteSource(@PathVariable String sourceName) throws org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
      DELETE /sources/:sourceName : delete the "id" source.
      Parameters:
      sourceName - the id of the sourceDTO to delete
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK)
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
